Package cs2030.simulator

Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs2030.simulator.Customer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GreedyCustomer
    public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes the status and basic information of a Customer.

    It has six private instance fields: timeOfArrival, timeOfService, durationOfService, customerID, server and isGreedy whose variable names are self-explanatory.

    It also comes with a public static counter named numOfCustomers which is used to keep track of the total number of customers so that we can assign correct IDs for them.
